Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: I have been teaching the course of Monetary Theory at the PhD program at Lancaster University (as External staff). The aim of this course is to introduce the state-of-the-art theoretical and empirical models of monetary policy. The course present the mainstream New Keynesian Models and provides the numerical tools to solve and estimate the model and to conduct professional policy analysis.
